T02D1892:220b-1: shr'i sa m'a dza lo ke shva ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1892:220b-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1892:220b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1892:220b-5: sprul pa'i 'od zer dpag med pa //
T02D1892:220b-7: rnam rtog med bde'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1892:221a-2: dpal ldan 'dus pa snang ba che //
T02D1892:221a-3: rgyud rgyal rim ba la brten te //
T02D1892:221a-4: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa yi //
T02D1892:221a-5: rim pa mdor bsdus gsal bar bri //
T02D1892:221a-6: dang bo snying rje'i stobs las byung //
T02D1892:221a-7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan byas //
T02D1892:221a-8: srid pa'i longs spyod bde ba chags //
T02D1892:221a-9: yongs su 'dzin pa rgyab kyis phyogs //
T02D1892:221a-10: dang sogs nor ni phun tshogs rnams //
T02D1892:221a-11: bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam gus //
T02D1892:221a-12: des bstan dam tshig spyod pa ni //
T02D1892:221a-13: yongs su skyong la rab tu brtson //
T02D1892:221a-14: bum pa gsang sogs dbang bskur ba //
T02D1892:221a-15: bla ma'i drin gyis yang dag thob //
T02D1892:221a-16: lus ngag sems rnams dag pa nyid //
T02D1892:221a-17: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub ba snod //
T02D1892:221a-18: ting 'dzin yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02D1892:221a-19: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa las //
T02D1892:221a-20: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1892:221a-21: de ltar gsangs sngags tshul gnas yin //
T02D1892:221a-22: ting 'dzin yan lag nyams gyur cing //
T02D1892:221a-23: de yi mi mthun phyogs gnas na //
T02D1892:221a-24: skye ba bye ba stong gis kyang //
T02D1892:221a-26: de bas ting 'dzin rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1892:221a-27: gsang sngags spyod gnas rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1892:221a-28: de las gzhan pa'i sems spangs te //
T02D1892:221a-29: g-yeng med brtson pas 'bad par bya //
T02D1892:221a-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag dang ;
T02D1892:221a-31: / mi mthun phyogs gang nges bya'i phyir //
T02D1892:221a-32: ting 'dzin yan lag mi mthun phyogs //
T02D1892:221a-33: de ni mdor bsdus nas bshad bya //
T02D1892:221a-34: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02D1892:221a-35: longs spyod rnams la ltos med cing //
T02D1892:221a-36: bzod ldan dam bcas brtan pa dang //
T02D1892:221a-38: lus dang ngag yid las rnams la //
T02D1892:221a-39: shes bzhin dang ni ldan pa la //
T02D1892:221a-40: sangs rgyas rgya skur rtog dran pa yis //
T02D1892:221a-41: lus kyi rjes dran yang dag ldan //
T02D1892:221a-42: dus gang du ni gang bya ba'i //
T02D1892:221a-43: rjes dran de la brtan pa dang //
T02D1892:221a-44: sgrib pa ldan ni spong ba dang //
T02D1892:221a-45: zas kyi tshod rig spyod lam rang //
T02D1892:221a-46: 'jig rten chos ni thams cad la //
T02D1892:221a-47: rtag tu sems ni btang snyoms dang //
T02D1892:221a-48: yo byad bsnyungs 'di yan lag ste //
T02D1892:221a-49: go bzlog pa ni mi mthun phyogs //
T02D1892:221a-50: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas
T02D1892:221a-51: su stan bde ba la 'dug nas bgegs bsal bar
T02D1892:221a-52: bya'o // aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D1892:221b-1: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02D1892:221b-2: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1892:221b-3: sarbba dusht'a n'am k'a ya b'aka tsitta k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1892:221b-4: sngags 'dis phyogs bcu'i bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya'o //
T02D1892:221b-5: de nas rang gi snying gar dbyangs kyi yi ge
T02D1892:221b-6: dang po yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1892:221b-7: la yi ge hri dmar po bsams la /
T02D1892:221b-8: de'i 'od zer spros pas rang gi lus sngag bar byas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D1892:221b-9: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas /
T02D1892:221b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bu'i sangs rgyas dang
T02D1892:221b-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul
T02D1892:221b-13: rje btsun bla ma yang nam mkha' la dmigs te /
T02D1892:221b-14: aom sa rabba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'ak
T02D1892:221b-15: tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro
T02D1892:221b-16: mi / zhes bya bas phyag bya'o //
T02D1892:221b-17: de nas yi ge hri de nyid las 'od zer
T02D1892:221b-18: gyi tshogs kha dog sna tshogs pa spro ba sngon
T02D1892:221b-20: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros la /
T02D1892:221b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1892:221b-22: zhes bzlas shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bla ma legs par mchod par bya'o //
T02D1892:221b-23: de rnams kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te /
T02D1892:221b-24: 'di ltar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1892:221b-25: gang zhig thog med srid pa'i chu klung du //
T02D1892:221b-26: ma lus kun rtog gis bsgags rnyog pa rnams //
T02D1892:221b-27: thugs rje che ldan spyan sngar de dag ni //
T02D1892:221b-28: cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi //
T02D1892:221b-29: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1892:221b-30: 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad pa //
T02D1892:221b-31: de dag kun la yang dag yid rang zhing //
T02D1892:221b-32: byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D1892:221b-33: yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrubs //
T02D1892:221b-34: snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yi thabs //
T02D1892:221b-35: rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi //
T02D1892:221b-36: bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02D1892:221b-37: rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing //
T02D1892:221b-38: sems dpa' dam pa rnams ni phun tshogs gzhi //
T02D1892:221b-39: dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid //
T02D1892:221b-40: dam pa'i chos la rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02D1892:222a-2: snying rje mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan //
T02D1892:222a-3: rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab bzhugs pa //
T02D1892:222a-4: brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1892:222a-5: bsam dang rnam par smin pa dag gyur pa //
T02D1892:222a-6: sgrib pa kun gyi bag chags yang dag 'byin //
T02D1892:222a-7: lhag par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi //
T02D1892:222a-8: sems ni byang chub dam par bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1892:222a-9: bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu //
T02D1892:222a-10: sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul //
T02D1892:222a-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas bdag ma lus ngo bo blos //
T02D1892:222a-12: yang dag nyid dud ni gnas par bgyi //
T02D1892:222a-13: de ltar lam la gnas pa'i bar du byas //
T02D1892:222a-15: ngo bo nyid dang bral phyir stong pa ste //
T02D1892:222a-16: rang bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med //
T02D1892:222a-17: rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni //
T02D1892:222a-18: ma lus smon pa las ni nges par grol //
T02D1892:222a-19: zhes bya bas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs
T02D1892:222a-20: pa'i spros pa thams cad dang bral bas khams gsum
T02D1892:222a-21: po ma lus pa stong par bsgoms la /
T02D1892:222a-22: 'dis stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab pa bstan par bya'o //
T02D1892:222a-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1892:222a-24: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
T02D1892:222a-25: par bya ba'i don stong ba'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1892:222a-26: sems de nyid yi ge aa dmar po yongs su
T02D1892:222a-27: gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par
T02D1892:222a-28: bsam / de'i steng du h'um nag po yongs su
T02D1892:222a-29: gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa nga po
T02D1892:222a-30: kha gyes pa lte ba'i yi ge h'um gis mtshan
T02D1892:222a-31: pa nyi ma la gnas pa bsam mo //
T02D1892:222a-32: de nas de las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1892:222a-33: gyi 'od zer phyogs bcur kun du 'phros pas bgegs
T02D1892:222a-35: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer de nyid las
T02D1892:222a-36: rdo rjer ba dang dra ba dpangs dpag tshad brgya
T02D1892:222a-38: bdud thams cad kyis bsgrod par mi nus pa /
T02D1892:222a-39: phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i phyi rol na dus
T02D1892:222a-40: mtha'i me'i phung po 'bar ba lta bus bskor ba
T02D1892:222a-41: dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og gi mthar thug pa bsams la /
T02D1892:222a-42: de'i dbus su chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya gyen kar gnas pa steng yangs pa /
T02D1892:222a-44: nam mkha'i khams rgya che ba khongs su chud pa /
T02D1892:222b-0: stong ka'i zla ba ltar dkar bar bsams @222b la ;
T02D1892:222b-1: de'i dbus su yi ge pam ser po las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma rgya che ba /
T02D1892:222b-2: de'i dbus su yi ge h'um nag po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D1892:222b-3: de'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i yi brum
T02D1892:222b-4: dkar po yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs
T02D1892:222b-5: bcu gnyis pa de'i lte bar zla ba gnas pa'i
T02D1892:222b-7: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po dang /
T02D1892:222b-9: dmar po gsum gyis rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D1892:222b-11: phyag dang po gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:222b-12: g-yas kyi gnyes pa na 'khor lo dkar po /
T02D1892:222b-14: phyag g-yon gyi gnyis pa na rin po che /
T02D1892:222b-15: gsum pa na padma dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D1892:222b-16: ral pa dang cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D1892:222b-17: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la /
T02D1892:222b-18: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D1892:222b-19: 'od zer dkar po'i tshogs rnam par 'phro ba bsams la /
T02D1892:222b-20: de yongs su gyur pa las khang pa brtsegs ma rim pa gnyis /
T02D1892:222b-21: rin po che sna tshogs 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin can /
T02D1892:222b-22: phyi'i rim pa zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02D1892:222b-24: ba dan dang rgyal mtshan kha dog rnam pa sna
T02D1892:222b-25: tshogs pa la dril bu btags pa rlung gis bskyod
T02D1892:222b-26: pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D1892:222b-29: dra ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa /
T02D1892:222b-30: phyi rol na gzugs kyi gnas kyi kha khyer rdo
T02D1892:222b-31: rje rin po che nye bar mdzes shing yid du
T02D1892:222b-32: 'ong ba'o // nang gi rim pa zlum po la rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1892:222b-33: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
T02D1892:222b-34: sdong bu dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la gnas pa'i zla ba bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1892:222b-35: nyi ma bdun gyi gdan dang ldan pa rnam par bsams nas /
T02D1892:222b-36: der dbus ma'i zla ba'i gdan la dbyangs kyi yi
T02D1892:222b-37: ge bcu drug nyis 'gyur du byas pa yongs su
T02D1892:222b-38: gyur ba las / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
T02D1892:222b-39: cu rtsa gnyis rgyur gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1892:222b-40: gyur ba las / bsams la / de'i steng du
T02D1892:222b-41: ka la sogs pa gsal bya'i yi ge sum cu
T02D1892:222b-42: rtsa bzhi dang da dha da dha ya la zhes
T02D1892:222b-43: bya ba'i yi ge drug gis bsnan pa nyis 'gyur
T02D1892:222b-44: du byas pa dkar po brgyad cu yongs su gyur
T02D1892:223a-0: gyur ba las / bsams la / pa las / @223a * //
T02D1892:223a-1: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu skyed par byed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1892:223a-2: de ltar shes rab dang thams kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1892:223a-3: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis bsgoms pa las kun gzhi
T02D1892:223a-4: rnam par shes pa gnas gyur nas /
T02D1892:223a-5: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rtags pas
T02D1892:223a-6: me long lta bu'i ye shes skye ba yin no
T02D1892:223a-7: // de nas zla ba de gnyes gcig tu gyur
T02D1892:223a-8: pas rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa'i dbye ba med pas
T02D1892:223a-9: // / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes yin no //
T02D1892:223a-10: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la yi ge h'um dmar po bsams la /
T02D1892:223a-11: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dmar po
T02D1892:223a-12: de'i lte bar yi ge h'um dmar po dang bcas
T02D1892:223a-13: par bsams la / rjed pa dang brjod par bya
T02D1892:223a-14: ba'i rnam par rtog pa gnas gyur pa las ni
T02D1892:223a-15: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1892:223a-16: de nas rdo rje de dang yi ge h'um las
T02D1892:223a-17: byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'gro ba rnams
T02D1892:223a-18: rnam par sbyangs la rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par
T02D1892:223a-19: bskyed de / lte ba la yi ge h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rjer bcug la /
T02D1892:223a-21: zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1892:223a-22: de ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin no //
T02D1892:223a-23: de nas zla ba dang rdo rje dang /
T02D1892:223a-24: yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1892:223a-25: ba las bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku shel
T02D1892:223a-26: gong dag pa 'dra ba zhal gsum pa /
T02D1892:223a-31: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa ;
T02D1892:223a-32: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pas rdo rje dmar po /
T02D1892:223a-34: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pas rin po che /
T02D1892:223a-36: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1892:223a-37: gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma
T02D1892:223a-38: dag pa dang bral bas chos kyi dbyings shin tu
T02D1892:223a-39: rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid bskyed pa rdo
T02D1892:223a-40: rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la /
T02D1892:223a-41: 'dod tshogs chen pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la bltas te de yang dag par sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1892:223a-42: de la 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can
T02D1892:223a-43: gyi khams rnam par sbyang ba'i rim pa ni 'di
T02D1892:223b-0: yin te / rab tu @223b dga' ba'i sgras nam
T02D1892:223b-1: mkha'i khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1892:223b-2: cad rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02D1892:223b-3: spyan la sogs pa nas re rdo rje'i mthar thug pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su phyung la /
T02D1892:223b-4: rang gi shes rab kyi lus la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1892:223b-5: de nas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D1892:223b-6: byang chub kyi sems zhu bar gyur pa rang dang
T02D1892:223b-7: 'dra ba'i padma'i lte bar h'um gyi byin gyis brlabs
T02D1892:223b-8: pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhub ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1892:223b-10: de yongs su gyur ba las rten dang brten pa'i
T02D1892:223b-11: dkyil 'khor lha bcud dgu'i bdag nyid can rdo rje
T02D1892:223b-12: 'chang ba gtso bor gyur par bsams la /
T02D1892:223b-13: der sems can rnams blos bcug nas /
T02D1892:223b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02D1892:223b-16: de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems zhu bar gyur pa rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02D1892:223b-17: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams
T02D1892:223b-18: byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsis dbang bskur nas
T02D1892:223b-19: / kshim dzrim kham gam shkam sam gi sa bon las mig dang /
T02D1892:223b-24: yid kyi dbang po'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1892:223b-25: 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'i sa'i snying po dang /
T02D1892:223b-29: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1892:223b-30: kun du bzang po'i rnam par bskyed de dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1892:223b-31: dza:h'um bam ho:kham ram gyis sa bon las gzugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1892:223b-36: chos kyi dbyings rdo rjer gyur pa gzugs dang /
T02D1892:223b-41: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1892:223b-42: 'go nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag dang ldan pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1892:223b-43: l'am m'am p'am t'am gis sa bon las ;
T02D1892:223b-47: rlung gi bdag nyid can spyan dang /
T02D1892:223b-50: sgrol ma 'go nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag dang ldan pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1892:223b-51: bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um gis bon las /
T02D1892:224a-3: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1892:224a-7: mi bskyod pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1892:224a-8: de nas brten pa'i dkyil 'khor de thams cad stong zhing nam mkha' lta bur bsams la /
T02D1892:224a-9: de'i 'og tu aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum kha dog dkar po dang /
T02D1892:224a-14: thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin can /
T02D1892:224a-15: snying rje dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin ho:dmar po
T02D1892:224a-16: gnyis kyi nang du chud pa mdun gyi nam mkha'
T02D1892:224a-17: la bsams la / kha'i sgo nas rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D1892:224a-18: rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i 'dod chags kyi mes
T02D1892:224a-19: zhu bar gyur pas rang gi rdo rje'i lam na
T02D1892:224a-20: phyung ste / rang dang 'dra ba'i chu skyes kyi ste ba'i nang du chud par bsams la /
T02D1892:224a-21: de'i stobs kyis bdag nyid rig ma dang bcas pa
T02D1892:224a-22: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1892:224a-24: dngul chu'i tshogs ltar 'od gsal bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D1892:224a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
T02D1892:224a-26: bzhin de nyid gdul bya'i skye bo rnam pa sna
T02D1892:224a-27: tshogs 'dul ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs kyi
T02D1892:224a-28: sku yang dag par 'dzin pa'i don du /
T02D1892:224a-29: rang gi rgyud las tha mi dad pa'i byams pa dang /
T02D1892:224a-32: btang snyoms kyi ngo bo nyid /
T02D1892:224a-36: sgrol mas bskul ba'i glus rab tu sad bzhin par bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D1892:224a-37: / sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02D1892:224a-38: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D1892:224a-39: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1892:224a-40: sa sems can yab chen gnyen ma chog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1892:224a-41: rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02D1892:224a-42: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol //
T02D1892:224a-43: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1892:224b-0: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du @224b gsol ;
T02D1892:224b-1: khyed ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba //
T02D1892:224b-2: 'jig rten dag ni don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson //
T02D1892:224b-3: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1892:224b-4: dga' spyod pa kun du bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1892:224b-5: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02D1892:224b-6: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba //
T02D1892:224b-7: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mches bzhed na //
T02D1892:224b-8: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dbyes par mdzod //
T02D1892:224b-9: de ltar glus yang dag par bskul ba'i 'og tu
T02D1892:224b-10: dngos po thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsams la
T02D1892:224b-11: / 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba'i skye bo dang
T02D1892:224b-12: rjes su mthun pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang
T02D1892:224b-13: dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
T02D1892:224b-14: dbang phyug gi skur bdag nyid bskyed par bya ba'i
T02D1892:224b-15: / phyir / zhu ba de yongs su gyur pa las yi ge hr'i:dmar po'o //
T02D1892:224b-16: de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po'i dbus
T02D1892:224b-17: na zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i:'od zer
T02D1892:224b-18: rnam par 'phro ba rnam par bsams la /
T02D1892:224b-19: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis
T02D1892:224b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa snang bar byas
T02D1892:224b-21: te / gdul bya'i sems can gyi khams rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par sbyangs nas /
T02D1892:224b-22: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu'i de
T02D1892:224b-23: bzhin gshegs pa 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang
T02D1892:224b-25: mtshan ma dang ldan par byas la /
T02D1892:224b-26: padma dmar po yi ge hr'i:sa mtshan pa de nyid du bcug nas padma dang /
T02D1892:224b-27: zla ba dang yi ge hr'i:de yongs su gyur pa
T02D1892:224b-28: las bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
T02D1892:224b-31: sku thams cad dang zhal dang po dmar ba /
T02D1892:224b-32: zhal g-yas ba sngo zhing g-yon pa dkar ba /
T02D1892:224b-33: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:224b-34: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na padma /
T02D1892:224b-35: gsum pa nang la gri bsnyams pa /
T02D1892:224b-36: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na rin po che /
T02D1892:224b-37: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02D1892:225a-0: ral pa dang cod pan dang ldan par bdag gnyid rnam par @225a * //
T02D1892:225a-2: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mi gnas pa'i don du sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1892:225a-3: aom dha rnam dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1892:225a-4: 'di dag rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang bsnyen pa'i yan lag chung ngu yin no //
T02D1892:225a-5: de'i 'og tu mig gnyis su aa dkar po las
T02D1892:225a-6: zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge kshim dang 'khor
T02D1892:225a-7: lo yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1892:225a-8: sa'i snying po rin po che'i chod pan can zhal
T02D1892:225a-9: dang phyag dang mtshan ma la sogs pa bcom ldan
T02D1892:225a-10: 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba ste de'i
T02D1892:225a-11: 'og ma rnams la de bzhin no //
T02D1892:225a-12: de bzhin du rnam ba gnyis su zla ba la
T02D1892:225a-13: gnas pa'i yi ge dzrim sngon po dang rdo rje
T02D1892:225a-14: yongs su gyur pa las phyag na rdo rje 'og
T02D1892:225a-15: nas bshad pa'i mi bskyod pa lta bu'o //
T02D1892:225a-16: sna la zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge kham
T02D1892:225a-17: ser po dang rin po che ljang gu cha dgu
T02D1892:225a-18: pa yongs su gyur pa las nam mkha'i snying po
T02D1892:225a-20: lce zla ba la gnas pa'i gam dmar po dang
T02D1892:225a-21: padma dmar po yongs su gyur pa las 'jig rten
T02D1892:225a-22: dbang phyag 'od dpag tu med pa lta bu'o /
T02D1892:225a-23: thod pa'i nang du zla ba la gnas pa'i ksham
T02D1892:225a-24: ljang gu dang ral gri yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1892:225a-25: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba don yod
T02D1892:225a-27: lte bar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge sam
T02D1892:225a-28: dkar po dang rdo rje dmar po yongs su gyur
T02D1892:225a-29: pa las sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' lta
T02D1892:225a-31: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu dang nye par sgrub pa chung ngu'o //
T02D1892:225a-34: sprul pa'i sku gsum bskyed par bya ba'i don du
T02D1892:225a-35: thugs kyi gsungs ba la sogs pa byin gyis brlab
T02D1892:225a-37: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi
T02D1892:225a-38: ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse
T02D1892:225a-39: lnga pa ste bar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi
T02D1892:225a-41: de'i 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i thugs rdo
T02D1892:225a-42: rje'i sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'gro ba rnams thugs
T02D1892:225a-43: rdo rje'i rnam pa bskyed pa /
T02D1892:225a-44: yang snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge h'um de nyid du bcug nas /
T02D1892:225a-45: yi ge h'um dang zla ba dang rdo rje yongs
T02D1892:225a-46: su gyur pa las thugs rdo rje zhes sdang rdo
T02D1892:225a-47: rje lta bu'i rin po che'i chod pan can bsams
T02D1892:225a-48: la / de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1892:225b-0: @225b yi ge h'um sngon po las byung ba'i 'od
T02D1892:225b-1: zer gyi sgo rnams las thugs rdo rje'i tshogs rnam
T02D1892:225b-2: par spros la de'i 'od zer gyis thog ma med
T02D1892:225b-3: pa nas grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rdo
T02D1892:225b-4: rje'i tshogs spyan drangs la nam mkha'i kham kun du
T02D1892:225b-5: la / dgang ngo // de las h'um de nyid
T02D1892:225b-6: las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha
T02D1892:225b-7: mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D1892:225b-8: thus rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol
T02D1892:225b-9: ba gdab par bya / dpal ldan rdo rje thugs
T02D1892:225b-10: 'chang ba // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsams pas //
T02D1892:225b-11: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1892:225b-12: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol /
T02D1892:225b-13: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1892:225b-14: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsams pas //
T02D1892:225b-15: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1892:225b-16: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol /
T02D1892:225b-17: de nas rang gi sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1892:225b-18: cad kyi thugs rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par lhag
T02D1892:225b-19: par mos shing ; aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1892:225b-20: zhes byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1892:225b-21: de'i steng lkog ma'i 'og tu zla ba la gnas
T02D1892:225b-22: pa'i padma dmar po'i lte ba la gnas pa'i zla
T02D1892:225b-23: ba la yi ge hr'i:dmar po bsams la /
T02D1892:225b-24: de las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin
T02D1892:225b-25: gshegs pa thams cad bkug nas yi ge hr'i:las gzugs
T02D1892:225b-26: rdo rje la sogs pa spros te /
T02D1892:225b-27: de rnams kyis de yang dag par mchod nas yi
T02D1892:225b-28: ge hr'i:de nyid du bcug la de thams cad yongs
T02D1892:225b-29: su gyur pa las ye shes sems dpa' bsam zhing
T02D1892:225b-30: / de'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1892:225b-31: de'i gong du lkog mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1892:225b-32: steng du a'a:dmar po yongs su gyur pa las padma
T02D1892:225b-33: dmar po de'i dbus su zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1892:225b-35: de'i 'od zer 'phros pa'i sgo nas byung ba'i de
T02D1892:225b-36: bzhin gshegs pa gsungs rdo rje sprul pa'i tshogs rnams
T02D1892:225b-37: kyis 'gro ba rnams gsungs rdo rje'i rnam par bskyed
T02D1892:225b-38: la / yang lkog mar gnas pa'i a'a:de nyid du
T02D1892:225b-39: bcug nas yi ge a'a:dang zla ba dang padma yongs
T02D1892:225b-40: la / su gyur las / gsung rdo rje 'dod
T02D1892:225b-41: chags rdo rje lta bu rin po che'i chod pan
T02D1892:225b-42: la / su gyur las / bsams la / de'i
T02D1892:225b-43: lkog mar zla ba la gnas pa'i a'a:dmar po las
T02D1892:226a-1: zer gyi sgo rnams las gsung rdo rje'i tshogs rnams spros la /
T02D1892:226a-2: de'i 'od zer gyis sngon grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1892:226a-3: kyis nam mkha'i gtos bkang la de bzhin du gzugs
T02D1892:226a-4: rdo rje ma la sogs pas de rnams yang dag
T02D1892:226a-5: par mchod de / rang nyid gsung rdo rjer byin
T02D1892:226a-6: gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o
T02D1892:226a-7: par mchod de / // chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan /
T02D1892:226a-8: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1892:226a-9: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1892:226a-10: rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol //

T02D1892:226a-12: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1892:226a-13: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //

T02D1892:226a-17: de nas mgo por zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor
T02D1892:226a-18: lo'i lte bar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D1892:226a-20: de las spros pa'i 'od zer gyi sgo las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje dang /
T02D1892:226a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje
T02D1892:226a-22: snga ma bzhin du nam mkha'i gtos gang bar bsams
T02D1892:226a-23: la / de nas snga ma bzhin du gzugs rdo
T02D1892:226a-24: rje la sogs pas de rnams yang dag par mchod
T02D1892:226a-25: la / de / mgo bo'i yi ge aom du
T02D1892:226a-26: bcug la sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa'i don
T02D1892:226a-27: du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1892:226a-28: dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba //
T02D1892:226a-29: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1892:226a-30: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su ;
T02D1892:226a-31: / rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1892:226a-32: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1892:226a-33: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //

T02D1892:226a-35: rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol //

T02D1892:226a-37: rang nyid sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

T02D1892:226a-39: 'di dag ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu dang sgrub pa chung ngu yin no //
T02D1892:226a-40: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon
T02D1892:226b-0: las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis @226b de bzhin
T02D1892:226b-2: mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su bzhugs par bsams nas /
T02D1892:226b-3: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1892:226b-4: mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa ltar //
T02D1892:226b-5: bdag kyang rtog par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1892:226b-6: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D1892:226b-7: zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pa'i
T02D1892:226b-8: tshigs su bcad pas dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab
T02D1892:226b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las byung ba'i spyan la
T02D1892:226b-11: sogs pa'i lha mo ye shes kyi bdud rtsis yongs
T02D1892:226b-12: su gang ba'i rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa
T02D1892:226b-13: rnams kyis gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod
T02D1892:226b-14: pa dang / rol mo dang bkra shis kyi glu
T02D1892:226b-15: rnams sna tshogs pa'i ca co 'don pas bdag nyid
T02D1892:226b-16: la dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02D1892:226b-17: byang chub kyi sems de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1892:226b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dbu'i steng
T02D1892:226b-19: gi cod pan la bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu
T02D1892:226b-21: 'di ni dbang gi 'bras bu chung ngu dang /
T02D1892:226b-22: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag chung ngu yin no //

T02D1892:226b-24: nyid sngar bsnyen pa chung ngu la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1892:226b-25: pas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang
T02D1892:226b-26: / thugs dang gsung dang sku rdo rjer byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1892:226b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1892:226b-28: yan lag bzhi pa bar ma rdzogs par byas nas rigs lnga dang bsre bar bya'o //
T02D1892:226b-29: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1892:226b-30: nu ma yan chad nas mgo bo'i bar du yi ge aom dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1892:226b-31: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phra rab kyi rang bzhin
T02D1892:226b-32: nu ma'i 'og nas lte ba yan chad du yi
T02D1892:226b-33: ge h'um sngon po yongs su gyur pa las mi
T02D1892:226b-34: bskyod pa'i phra rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1892:226b-35: lte ba'i 'og nas rked pa'i bar du yi ge
T02D1892:226b-36: sv'a sar po yongs su gyur pa las rin chen
T02D1892:226b-37: 'byung ldan gyi phra rab kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1892:226b-38: padma nas brla gnyis su yi ge a'a:dmar po yongs
T02D1892:226b-39: su gyur pa las 'od dpag tu med pa'i phra
T02D1892:226b-41: pus mo gnyis nas brtsams te /
T02D1892:226b-42: rkang mthil gnyis kyi mthar thug par yi ge h'a
T02D1892:226b-43: ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las don yod par
T02D1892:227a-2: / de ltar rang gi rig ma la rigs lnga dang bsre ba dmigs la /
T02D1892:227a-3: de nas yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rang gi rdo rje /
T02D1892:227a-4: aom yongs su gyur pa las nor bu /
T02D1892:227a-5: bu gar phat kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1892:227a-6: rang gi rig ma la yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las padma /
T02D1892:227a-7: yi ge a'a: yongs su gyur pa las lte bar bsam mo //
T02D1892:227a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla
T02D1892:227a-9: na med pa'i bde ba la yang dag par longs
T02D1892:227a-10: spyod pa'i mchod pa'i don du rang dang 'dra ba
T02D1892:227a-11: dang lhan cig dga' ba tsam par byin gyis brlab
T02D1892:227a-12: par bya'o // aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko&amp ;
T02D1892:227a-14: 'di dag ni dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1892:227a-15: de'i 'og tu rab tu dga' ba'i sgras de bzhin
T02D1892:227a-16: gshegs pa lnga khar bcug la 'dod chags chen po'i
T02D1892:227a-17: mes zhu bar gyur nas rdo rje'i lam nas phyung
T02D1892:227a-18: la / rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i chu skyes
T02D1892:227a-19: kyi nang du byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i dkyil
T02D1892:227a-20: 'khor yi ge hr'i:dmar pos byin gyis brlab par bsams
T02D1892:227a-21: la / la / de yongs su gyur pa las

T02D1892:227a-24: la / la / la / bdag dang gzhan gyi
T02D1892:227a-25: don rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir phyi rol du spro
T02D1892:227a-26: la / la / la / bar bya ste /
T02D1892:227a-27: a'a ro lik ces pas 'od dpag tu med pa
T02D1892:227a-31: dkar po zhal gsum dang ldan pa /
T02D1892:227a-32: phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:227a-33: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na padma dmar po /

T02D1892:227a-36: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa phyung la sgros
T02D1892:227a-37: pas 'gro ba rnams gsung gi rdo rje'i rnam par
T02D1892:227a-38: byas nas / de'i skur bcug la de yang rang
T02D1892:227a-39: gi lus la dngos po thams cad kyis gzhug par
T02D1892:227a-40: byas nas / bya'o // de bzhin du thams cad du yang spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1892:227a-41: de nas dzin dzik ces bya bas rnam par snang
T02D1892:227a-42: mdzad snga ma lta bu phyung la shar phyogs kyi
T02D1892:227a-43: zla ba la dgod par bya'o //
T02D1892:227a-44: de'i 'og tu ratna dhrik ces bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po /
T02D1892:227a-47: dkar po dang ldan pa phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i
T02D1892:227b-0: phyag gnyis @227b kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud
T02D1892:227b-1: pa / g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na rin po che ljang gu /
T02D1892:227b-2: gsum pa na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D1892:227b-3: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa na 'khor lo /
T02D1892:227b-4: gsum pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02D1892:227b-5: lho phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1892:227b-6: de nas badzra dhrik ces bya bas mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po /
T02D1892:227b-7: zhal gsum pa sngo ba dang /
T02D1892:227b-10: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:227b-11: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis pa na zhi ba'i rdo rje nag po /
T02D1892:227b-12: gsum pa na ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D1892:227b-13: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa na nor bu /
T02D1892:227b-14: gsum pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02D1892:227b-15: nub phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1892:227b-16: de'i 'og tu pradzny'a dhrik ces bya bas don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
T02D1892:227b-19: dkar po phyag drug pa rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:227b-20: phyag g-yas pa'i gnyis pa na ral gri /
T02D1892:227b-21: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02D1892:227b-22: phyag g-yon pa'i gnyis pa na rin po che /
T02D1892:227b-23: gsum pa na padma bsnams pa /
T02D1892:227b-24: byang phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1892:227b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po ni nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1892:227b-26: ral pa dang cod pan can yin la /
T02D1892:227b-27: rnam par snang mdzad ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02D1892:227b-28: de nas mo ha r'a ti zhes bya bas lha
T02D1892:227b-29: mo spyan zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rnam par
T02D1892:227b-30: snang mdzad dang 'dra ba me'i phyogs su zla ba'i
T02D1892:227b-32: de nas dve sha r'a ti zhes bya bas m'a
T02D1892:227b-33: ma k'i zhal dang phyag la sogs pa mi bskyod
T02D1892:227b-34: pa dang 'dra ba bden bral gyi phyogs su zla
T02D1892:227b-35: ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1892:227b-36: de nas r'a ga ra ti zhes bya bas lha
T02D1892:227b-37: mo gos dkar mo zhal dang phyag la sogs pa
T02D1892:227b-38: 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra ba rlung gi
T02D1892:227b-39: phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o
T02D1892:227b-40: // de nas badzra r'a ti zhes bya bas sgrol
T02D1892:227b-41: ma zhal dang phyag la sogs pa rin chen 'byung
T02D1892:227b-42: ldan dang 'dra ba rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis thabs
T02D1892:227b-43: la 'khyud pa phyag gnyis pa na autpala ser po
T02D1892:228a-0: // kha phye ba / gsum pa na ral gri bsnams @228a * //
T02D1892:228a-2: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na rin po che /
T02D1892:228a-3: gsum pa na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02D1892:228a-4: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
T02D1892:228a-5: de'i 'og tu aom a'a:r'u pa badzra h'um /
T02D1892:228a-6: zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum gyi bar du ming bcug la /
T02D1892:228a-7: re re'i sngags brjod nas gzugs rdo rje la sogs
T02D1892:228a-8: pa nas chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i bar gyi mchod
T02D1892:228a-9: pa'i lha mo rnams rim bzhin du /
T02D1892:228a-15: chos kyi dbyings rdo rje go rims bzhin du sku mdog dkar ba dang /
T02D1892:228a-21: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis thabs la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:228a-22: phyag g-yas pa'i gnyis pa na me long dang /
T02D1892:228a-27: chos 'byung ba'i mtshan ma bsnams pa /
T02D1892:228a-28: phyag lhag ma rnams na rim bzhin du ral gri dang /
T02D1892:228a-31: rgyan dang na bza' la sogs pas brgyan pa zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba /
T02D1892:228a-32: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis legs par bzhugs pa /
T02D1892:228a-33: rim pa gnyis pa'i me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams dang /
T02D1892:228a-34: shar phyogs kyi sgo logs gnyis su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la snga ma bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1892:228a-35: de'i 'og tu ya m'anta krita ces bya bas gshin
T02D1892:228a-36: rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal gsum pa nag
T02D1892:228a-37: po dang dkar po dang dmar po /
T02D1892:228a-38: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra bal 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:228a-39: phyag lhag ma rnams kyis rdo rje tho ba dang /
T02D1892:228a-43: snga ma bzhin du phyung la spro ba la sogs
T02D1892:228a-44: pa bya ba sngon du 'gro bas shar phyogs kyi
T02D1892:228a-45: sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1892:228a-46: de bzhin du pradzny'anta krita ces bya bas shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dmar po zhal gsum /
T02D1892:228a-50: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:228a-51: phyag lhag ma rnams na rdo rje dbyig pa dkar po dang /
T02D1892:228a-53: rin po che dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D1892:228a-54: snga ma bzhin du spro ba la sogs pa byas
T02D1892:228b-0: la lho phyogs kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor @228b
T02D1892:228b-2: de bzhin du padm'a ntakrita ces bya bas padma mthar byed sku mdog dmar ba /
T02D1892:228b-3: zhal gsum pa dmar po dang /
T02D1892:228b-7: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:228b-8: phyag lhag ma rnams na padma dmar po dang /
T02D1892:228b-11: rin po che bsnams pa snga ma bzhin du phyung la /
T02D1892:228b-12: spro ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1892:228b-13: nub kyi sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag pa bya'o //
T02D1892:228b-14: de bzhin du bighn'anta krita ces bya bas bgegs mthar
T02D1892:228b-15: byed sku mdog nag po zhal gsum nag po dang
T02D1892:228b-19: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba la 'khyud pa /
T02D1892:228b-20: lhag ma rnams na rdo rje nag po kha gyes pa dang /
T02D1892:228b-24: snga ma bzhin du phyung la /
T02D1892:228b-25: spro ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D1892:228b-26: byang phyogs kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag par bya'o ;
T02D1892:228b-27: / khro bo thams cad kyang dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1892:228b-32: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1892:228b-33: klu chen po rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1892:228b-34: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D1892:228b-35: ljags bskyod cing 'jigs su rung ba nyi ma'i 'od shas cher 'bar ba'o //
T02D1892:228b-36: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa bskyed cing brtan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1892:228b-37: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i sa bon
T02D1892:228b-38: gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
T02D1892:228b-39: la mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams te rang gi
T02D1892:228b-40: sgo srung rnams kyis de'i ba gegs bskrad la yang
T02D1892:228b-42: rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon phul la /
T02D1892:228b-43: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnam par spros te yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1892:228b-44: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams kyis go rims ji bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02D1892:228b-48: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chen po dang /
T02D1892:228b-49: bsnyen pa'i yan lag chen po yin no //
T02D1892:228b-50: de yang snga ma bzhin du mig la sogs pa
T02D1892:228b-51: byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni rnam par smin
T02D1892:228b-52: pa'i 'bras bu chen po dang nye bar sgrub pa
T02D1892:229a-0: de nas sngar bshad pa'i rim @229a * //
T02D1892:229a-1: pas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab par
T02D1892:229a-2: bya ba ni sgrub pa chen po dang skyes bu
T02D1892:229a-3: byed pa'i 'bras bu chen po yin no //
T02D1892:229a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi thugs ka'i
T02D1892:229a-5: ye shes sems dpa'i snying po'i 'od kyis de bzhin
T02D1892:229a-6: gshegs pa rnams bskul la bkug ste ;
T02D1892:229a-7: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams nas /
T02D1892:229a-8: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas yang dag par mchod
T02D1892:229a-9: la dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab bo
T02D1892:229a-10: / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku
T02D1892:229a-11: las byung ba'i lha mo spyan ma la sogs pa
T02D1892:229a-12: rnams ye shes kyi bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba'i
T02D1892:229a-13: rin po che'i bum pa thogs pas dbang bskur ba
T02D1892:229a-14: / dang / dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyi dbu la rang gi bdag por gyur pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1892:229a-15: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu la mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1892:229a-16: mi bskyod pa'i dbu la ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1892:229a-17: spyan dang gzugs rdo rje dang gshin rje gshed kyi dbu la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1892:229a-18: m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje dang chos kyi
T02D1892:229a-19: dbyings rdo rje dang shes rab mthar byed dang bgegs
T02D1892:229a-20: mthar byed kyi dbu la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1892:229a-21: gos dkar mo dang ro rdo rje dang rta mgrin gyi dbu la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1892:229a-22: sgrol ma dang reg rdo rje'i dbu la ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1892:229a-23: dri rdo rje'i dbu la ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1892:229a-28: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1892:229a-29: kun du bzang po'i dbul ni go rims bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1892:229a-34: mi bskyod pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1892:229a-35: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa
T02D1892:229a-36: dkyil 'khor pa 'di dag thams cad rigs kyi bdag
T02D1892:229a-37: po dang bcas shing shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1892:229a-38: bzhin dri ma med pa'i mchog tu bde ba dam
T02D1892:229a-39: pa'i ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1892:229a-40: de ltar na 'di dag ni sgrub pa chen po dang dbang gi 'bras bu chen po yin no //
T02D1892:229a-41: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon
T02D1892:229a-42: gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i khams na
T02D1892:229a-43: gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul thams cad bdag
T02D1892:229a-44: nyid kyi rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i snying gar
T02D1892:229b-0: cho ga bzhin @229b du bcug la rang dang 'dra
T02D1892:229b-1: ba'i padma'i nang du zhu bar gyur pa bsams nas
T02D1892:229b-2: / de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang /
T02D1892:229b-3: phyi'i mchod pa'i chogs rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod la /
T02D1892:229b-4: mchod pa dang mchod pa byed pa po dbyer med du nga rgyal byas nas /
T02D1892:229b-5: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1892:229b-6: de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa la 'di ltar bstod par bya'o //
T02D1892:229b-7: rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che //
T02D1892:229b-8: mi rtog nam mkhar rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1892:229b-9: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1892:229b-10: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1892:229b-11: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02D1892:229b-12: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02D1892:229b-13: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog / ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1892:229b-14: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1892:229b-15: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02D1892:229b-16: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02D1892:229b-17: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1892:229b-18: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1892:229b-19: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D1892:229b-20: dkyil 'khor mchog gsum yi ge gsum //
T02D1892:229b-21: rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1892:229b-22: don yod rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1892:229b-23: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1892:229b-24: rang bzhin dag pa las byung ba //
T02D1892:229b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1892:229b-26: de nas bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga 'di ltar bya ste /
T02D1892:229b-27: mdun du yi ge yam yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1892:229b-28: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can ba dan gyis
T02D1892:229b-30: de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i
T02D1892:229b-31: dkyil 'khor gru gsum rab tu 'bar ba'i gzugs can
T02D1892:229b-32: dmigs la / de'i steng du aa yongs su gyur
T02D1892:229b-33: pa las thod pa de'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1892:229b-35: zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams nas /
T02D1892:229b-36: de'i 'og tu bsreg pa dang 'bar ba la sogs pas yang dag par sbyangs la /
T02D1892:229b-37: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs par bsams nas /
T02D1892:229b-38: de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsam mo //
T02D1892:229b-39: de nas yi ge aom gyi 'od zer gyis de
T02D1892:229b-40: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud
T02D1892:229b-41: rtsi bkug la / bdud rtsi lnga po de nyid kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1892:229b-42: de nas bsreg ba dang 'bar bas yi ge aom
T02D1892:229b-43: dang rdo rje de nyid du zhu bar gyur par
T02D1892:230a-1: pa'i bdud rtsi de lca la yi ge h'um las rdo rje bkod pa'i lce bzang po dang /
T02D1892:230a-2: ro rdo rjes bstabs pas bdag nyid dang /
T02D1892:230a-3: dkyil 'khor ba rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02D1892:230a-4: de ltar dkyil 'khor 'byin pa nas bdud rtsi myong ba'i bar du ni /
T02D1892:230a-5: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02D1892:230a-6: sems dbang du gyur pa thob na zhi ba la
T02D1892:230a-7: sogs pa'i las rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don bsgrub par
T02D1892:230a-8: bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1892:230a-9: thig le rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ba yin pas
T02D1892:230a-10: sems brtan par bya ba'i don du las kyi rgyal
T02D1892:230a-12: de bas na ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa
T02D1892:230a-13: bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsum po snang
T02D1892:230a-14: bar byas nas rang gi lha'i rnam par byas la
T02D1892:230a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1892:230a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ni bdag nyid la gzhug go //
T02D1892:230a-17: bdag ni ye shes sems dpa' la gzhug go //
T02D1892:230a-18: ye shes sems dpa' ni mtshan mar ro //
T02D1892:230a-19: mtshan ma ni tsa na ka'i tshad kyi thig ler bcug la /
T02D1892:230a-20: thig le'i dbus su bskyed pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1892:230a-21: gyi 'khor lo skad cig tsam gyis bsgom par bya'o
T02D1892:230a-22: // 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni chen po'i sgrar brjod do //
T02D1892:230a-23: tsa na ka'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du de ltar bsgoms la /
T02D1892:230a-24: yang thig le'i dbus su chud pa'i 'od zer gyi
T02D1892:230a-25: tshogs su snang ba las sa bon du bsam mo
T02D1892:230a-26: // sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams las mtshan ma'i
T02D1892:230a-27: mtshan ma'i 'od zer rnams las ye shes sems dpar
T02D1892:230a-28: // bsam mo // ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer spros pa las /
T02D1892:230a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i bdag nyid bsam mo //
T02D1892:230a-30: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i 'od zer gyi snang ba las /
T02D1892:230a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin du gnas par bsams la /
T02D1892:230a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo de kun du spros pa'i
T02D1892:230a-33: 'od zer rnams kyis khams gsum pa ma lus par
T02D1892:230a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyis khyab par bsgoms nas
T02D1892:230a-35: / yang de bzhin du thig le'i bar du bsdu zhing slar spro ba dang /
T02D1892:230a-36: slar yang thig le'i bar du bsdu ba dang /
T02D1892:230a-37: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lo bsgom pa ji srid
T02D1892:230a-38: 'dod kyi bar du byas pa ni thig le'i rnal
T02D1892:230b-1: la bzhugs pa'i rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshin gshegs pa
T02D1892:230b-2: rnams bdag nyid kyi khar bcug ste /
T02D1892:230b-3: byang chub kyi sems zhu bar gyur ba las rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02D1892:230b-4: snga ma bzhin du rang dang 'dra ba'i padma'i lte
T02D1892:230b-5: bar byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'i thig ler bsams
T02D1892:230b-6: la der yi ge hr'i:yongs su gyur pa las padma
T02D1892:230b-7: tsa na ka'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du bsgoms la
T02D1892:230b-8: / padma'i lte ba'i dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1892:230b-9: lo bskyed pa'i rim pas skad cig gis bsgom par
T02D1892:230b-10: / bya'o // 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni chen po'i sgrar brjod do //
T02D1892:230b-11: 'di la ji srid du sems brtan par ma gyur
T02D1892:230b-12: pa de srid du shin tu spro bar mi bya'o
T02D1892:230b-13: // sems brtan par gyur nas ni yang de bzhin
T02D1892:230b-14: gshegs pa rnams dang spro ba dang bsdu bar bya
T02D1892:230b-15: ba ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1892:230b-16: de nas bsgoms pas skyo na /
T02D1892:230b-17: yi ge dgu po ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i
T02D1892:230b-18: sa bon yongs su bskor te gnas pa la bzlas
T02D1892:230b-19: brjod bya'o // aom a'a:aom ma ni padme h'um h'um /
T02D1892:230b-20: zhes bya ba'i sngags zlos shing sku dang gsung dang
T02D1892:230b-21: thugs rdo rje re re zhing ngam thugs rdo rje'i
T02D1892:230b-22: bdag nyid can dang ye shes sems dpa' dang de'i
T02D1892:230b-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1892:230b-24: ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig lnga po'i bdag nyid can bsams la /
T02D1892:230b-25: de re re zhing 'byin pa dang 'jug pa'i rlung
T02D1892:230b-26: gis rim gyis sam cig car spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1892:230b-27: bar bya zhing / myur ba dang ngal chen pa'i
T02D1892:230b-28: nyes pa dang bral bar sngags kyi de kho na
T02D1892:230b-29: nyid la lhag par mos pas /
T02D1892:230b-30: gsang sngags yi ge dgu po bzlas par bya ste 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1892:230b-31: de nas bsgom pa dang bzlas pas dub pa bsal ba'i don du lha mo'i glus bskul la /
T02D1892:230b-32: spyi bo'i steng du mtho gang tsam gyi sa dpags par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1892:230b-33: aom dkar po gnas par rnam par bsams la /
T02D1892:230b-34: de las bdud rtsi 'bab pas bdag nyid tshim par byas par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1892:230b-35: 'di ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1892:230b-36: de nas yang ngal bso la sngags kyi de kho
T02D1892:230b-37: na nyid la lhag par mos pas ji srid kyi
T02D1892:230b-39: de nas gshegs su gsol bar 'dod na rang gi
T02D1892:230b-40: ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer spros pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1892:231a-0: gyi @231a * // 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i phyi
T02D1892:231a-1: rol du spros la mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams
T02D1892:231a-3: des bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1892:231a-4: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor aom kram to ba sarbba sa tv'artha /
T02D1892:231a-5: siddhi ma datt'a ya nu ga /
T02D1892:231a-6: gatstsha tv'am buddha bi sha yam /
T02D1892:231a-7: phun ra ga ma na yatstsha:/
T02D1892:231a-8: zhes bya ba 'dis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1892:231a-9: de'i sprul pa rnams bdag nyid la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1892:231a-10: de nas bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir 'di ltar smon lam gdab par bya ste /
T02D1892:231a-11: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i dpal //
T02D1892:231a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes pa ni //
T02D1892:231a-13: dge ba 'di yis thob gyur nas //
T02D1892:231a-14: 'gro bas kyang ni de thob shog / phyag rgya chen po'i don grub phyir //
T02D1892:231a-15: spyod gang sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa //
T02D1892:231a-16: 'gro ba'i don ni bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1892:231a-17: spyod de nyid dang bdag ldan shog / de bzhin gshegs rnams thabs gang gis //
T02D1892:231a-18: thams cad mkhyen nyid go 'phang brnyes //
T02D1892:231a-19: dag cing yan lag kun rdzogs pa //
T02D1892:231a-20: thabs de dang ni bdag ldan shog / sgrib pa thams cad yongs zad phyir //
T02D1892:231a-21: sangs rgyas kyis sngags shes rab gang //
T02D1892:231a-22: rnam kun mkhyen nyid kun bya'i phyir //
T02D1892:231a-23: bdag gis shes rab de thob shog / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1892:231a-24: rab mnyam gzhag ste gnas par bya //
T02D1892:231a-25: rang gi dkyil 'khor pa tshul du //
T02D1892:231a-26: khams gsum po ni blta bar bya //
T02D1892:231a-27: bza' dang btung ba dus su ni //
T02D1892:231a-28: skad cig ma yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1892:231a-29: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsams te //
T02D1892:231a-30: bza' dang bca' sogs rnam sbyangs la ;
T02D1892:231a-31: / bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga yang //
T02D1892:231a-32: rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1892:231a-33: rang gi lhag lhag gtso bor gyur //
T02D1892:231a-34: dkyil 'khor snying gar bsams nas su //
T02D1892:231a-35: rang sngags byin brlabs ro yis ni //
T02D1892:231a-36: sku yi rdo rje sogs tshim bya //
T02D1892:231a-37: mchod pa 'di nyid dam pa ste //
T02D1892:231a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags //
T02D1892:231a-39: 'di nyid nang gi sbyin sreg ni //
T02D1892:231a-40: yin par gsang 'dus las bshad do //
T02D1892:231a-41: khrus kyi dus su spyan sogs kyis //
T02D1892:231a-42: dbang bskur lta bur rnam par spyad //
T02D1892:231a-43: dran pa brjed sogs nyes pa yis //
T02D1892:231a-44: gal te dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02D1892:231a-45: de tshe dam tshig rdo rje zhes //
T02D1892:231b-0: bya ba rang @231b gi snying gar bsgom //
T02D1892:231b-1: de yi thugs kar yi ge kham //
T02D1892:231b-2: mtshan ma'i dbus su chu dbang bsam //
T02D1892:231b-3: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sogs //
T02D1892:231b-4: cho ga ji bzhin dgod par bya //
T02D1892:231b-5: sku gsung thugs kyi dbus chud pa'i //
T02D1892:231b-6: de yi sa bon kha nas bzlas //
T02D1892:231b-7: dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes pa ni //
T02D1892:231b-8: sbyong 'dod dam tshig rdo rje yis //
T02D1892:231b-9: gsang sngags yongs su bzlas nas ni //
T02D1892:231b-10: bsgom pa'i mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
T02D1892:231b-11: nyal ba'i dus su rang gi ni //
T02D1892:231b-13: yang na stong nyid bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1892:231b-14: rnal 'byor pas ni ci bder nyal //
T02D1892:231b-15: gnyid sad pa yi dus su ni //
T02D1892:231b-16: lha mos bskul ba dran byas la //
T02D1892:231b-17: mal nas langs te rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1892:231b-18: snga ma bzhin du bsam gtan spyad //
T02D1892:231b-21: byang chub 'od kyi ngor mdzad de //
T02D1892:231b-22: mar me mdzad kyis 'di byas so //
T02D1892:231b-23: sgrub thabs 'di ni legs bris pa //
T02D1892:231b-24: bdag gis dag ba gang thob pa //
T02D1892:231b-25: de yis 'gro ba thams cad ni //
T02D1892:231b-26: rdo rje chos kyi gnas thob shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1892:231b-27: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rim pas bsgrubs pa ;
T02D1892:231b-28: / slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1892:231b-30: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam k'a ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D1892:231b-31: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
